info.name: Cosmic Leaf Terra
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Ross Lovegrove

MATERIALS:
“It appears as a digital leaf from another World , embedded with scales like a reptile or an insect which gather light and shadow on its body to seduce a mate.” Floor lamp, with matching table, recessed and suspension versions. Available with halogen or metal halide source. Materials: chromed steel structure; body lamp-diffuser in transparent methacrylate with texture; painted metal lighting unit.

INFORMATIONS:
HALO 1x100W (G53) - QR111n
HIR METAL HALIDE 1x70W (GX8,5)- HIR 111
